name: treefmt-vscode
description: treefmt streamlines the process of applying formatters to your project, making it a breeze with just one command line.

treefmt.command.description: Path to the treefmt executable, e.g. /usr/local/bin/treefmt. If not set, the extension will use the bundled treefmt binary.

treefmt.config.description: Path to the treefmt configuration file, e.g. treefmt.toml. If not set, the extension will look for a treefmt.toml file in the workspace root.

treefmt.useStdin.description: Toggle between using stdin or the legacy onsave version for formatting.

treefmt.debug.description: Enable debug logging for the extension.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
